text:
"Portrait of Stéphane Mallarmé", with his last written sentence before dying, arranged in the manner of Le Coup de Dé.
✒️
Ink on paper, 2000 (24 years ago !)
Sadly the original was ruined in a flood in the 2010's... 🌊
